entry.title: Integrate Paytm Payment Gateway for static hosted Website using Google Cloud Function.
entry.content: Many a times there is a need for a payment gateway usually for Donation but You have a Static Hosting Ex: github pages. To keep your Merchent key Secret you need to buy hosting, Well You Donâ€™t Need it Anymore because you can use Google Cloud Functions for free.
